meanings.definition: A blue mineral consisting of sodium aluminum silicate.
meanings.sent1: The lazurite sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She painted the sky with a beautiful lazurite hue.
meanings.sent3: The lazurite whispered secrets to the other minerals in the cave.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were as deep and captivating as lazurite.
meanings.sent5: The lazurite shimmered like a hidden treasure in the rock.

meanings.sent1: The lazurite of the ocean mesmerized the young child.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was a stunning shade of lazurite.
meanings.sent3: The lazurite sky seemed to stretch on forever.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as smooth and rich as lazurite.
meanings.sent5: The lazurite of the night sky twinkled with distant stars.
